mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_comments(EMAIL, NOTICE_SEQ, COMMENTS_SEQ, COMMENTS, REG_DATE,EDITED) VALUES(#{email}, #{notice_seq}, nextval('comments_seq'), #{comments}, now(), DEFAULT)
